attributes.action: Reduce road traffic congestion by hypothecating revenues from car taxation to subsidise public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The motorist is already heavily taxed through car tax, fuel duty, tolls and congestion charges.  If some or all of these charges could be seen to be subsidising the "greener alternative" (public transport), it would make such taxation more acceptable to the electorate.  It would also benefit everyone through improved public transport infrastructure and lower fares, encouraging greater use of the same (and hopefully reducing road congestion at the same time).

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
